# Dynamic Parameter Stack Area Construction
If a frame pointer is used, the option exists to dynamically create the parameter stack area. This is not currently done in the [!INCLUDE[vcprx64](../build/includes/vcprx64_md.md)] compiler.  
  
## See Also  
 [Stack Usage](../build/stack-usage.md)
